title: Baked fish with vegetables and herbs
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '3 onions, thinly sliced', '1 red pepper, thinly sliced', '1/2 green pepper, thinly sliced', '3 shallots, thinly sliced', '1/2 courgette, thinly sliced', '1/2 yellow courgette, thinly sliced', '1 large tomato, diced', '85g (3 oz) black olives, halved', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'half a bunch fresh chives, chopped', 'half a bunch fresh basil leaves, chopped', 'half a bunch fresh coriander, chopped', '1kg (2 lb) cod fillets (or any other firm fish)']
